ygData.subject: RE: Location of High Quality Firing sheets
ygData.msgSnippet: http://www.eqtraders.com/ You can find everything you need here for all trade skills.  But seeing how it appears you are potting at FP, firing sheets are
ygData.messageBody:
http://www.eqtraders.com/

You can find everything you need here for all trade skills. But seeing how
it appears you are potting at FP, firing sheets are located at the hut left
of the first inn in East Commons.

Good luck! And if you ever figure out how to make deities be sure to let us
know.

-----Original Message-----
From: marc.kazen@... [mailto:marc.kazen@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 9:08 AM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Location of High Quality Firing sheets


From: marc.kazen@...

Does anyone have a definitive list of the locations where I can buy
supplies? I located the pottery sketches in North Freeport next to the
bank, and clay in North Freeport in Groflath's Forge shop (by the Bard
guild). I can't seem to find High Quality Firing Sheets anywhere? Does
anyone know? Thanks.
